nodes.bodyText: Looks like we are deviating from convention we use from go-sdk.  Is there a reason to move away from existing convention.  We don't want to build 2 separate dashboards for each different type of sdk.

'-' does not work well with certain backends like prometheus for instance.  It would be nice to replace '-' with '_' everywhere if possible.  I think we have to plugin name sanitizer to fix that at runtime otherwise.
